ts_text1: Make sure to read and understand the following terms and conditions thoroughly before maintaining or using the services of GBarena. This is a binding agreement. Welcome to GBarena. The terms of services demonstrate the terms and conditions in which GBarena and its associates (“GBarena”, “we”, “our” and “us”) present the platform of GBarena (“Site”) and the provided tournaments and competitions on this website, the mobile app or any other services that link to this Terms of Service despite how it is accessed or used online through PC or smart devices (“Services”).
ts_text2: BY ACCESSING THE WEBSITE OF GBARENA, YOU ARE AGREEING TO BE BOUND AND COMPLY WITH BY FOLLOWING THE TERMS OF USE AND THE PRIVACY POLICY OF GBARENA. IF YOU DISAGREE WITH ANY OF THE  TERMS, YOU ARE PROHIBITED FROM ACCESSING AND USING THIS SITE. THE MATERIALS AND SERVICES CONTAINED IN THIS WEBSITE ARE PROTECTED BY COPYRIGHT AND TRADEMARK LAW.
ts_sec_1_text: We have the right to change or modify the terms of us occasionally. GBarena has the right to modify, change or discontinue any section of services in any circumstances. Please review and read the terms frequently. On the off chance that anytime you do not consent to any segment of the Privacy Policy or the terms of use, you should immediately quit using our Services. You recognize and acknowledge that any disputes with our Privacy Policy, including any breaks or breaches for security or privacy policy, will be subject to constraints to the limitations on liability contained in our terms of use and the privacy policy.
ts_sub_text_1: GBarena grants you a revocable, non-transferable, non-exclusive limited right and license to access and use its services provided using smart devices or personal computers subject to these terms and conditions and limited for personal use only.  All rights not explicitly allowed by GBarena under these Terms of Service are hereby reserved by GBarena. Any third-party scripts, contents or code, that is linked or referred from our Services, are authorized and licensed to you by the third parties that reserve such script or code, and not by GBarena.
ts_sub_title_2: Use of data and account registrations
ts_sub_text_2: To get access to certain parts of the Services, you might be required to create an account by our Services. In the event that your contact data changes, you agree that you will immediately update the data of the account to mirror those changes. Certain other information about you and your account data is subject to our Privacy Policy. Through your use of our Services, you agree to the collection of data and use (as it is mentioned in the Privacy Policy) of certain data of you. You agree that you will not make an account or access our Services in the event that you are under the age limitations set out in our Privacy Policy or any other conditions that are mentioned in our policies.  We will maintain certain data that you transmit to the Site for the purpose of managing the performance of the Site, as well as data relating to your use of the Site. Although we perform regular routine backups of data, you are solely responsible for all data that you transmit or that relates to any activity you have undertaken using the Site. You agree that we shall have no liability to you for any loss or corruption of any such data, and you hereby waive any right of action against us arising from any such loss or corruption of such data.
ts_sub_text_3_1: Do not use our services unless to run esports and video games tournaments or competitions and conducting any kind of gambling is strictly restricted.
ts_sub_text_3_2: You are not permitted to make available any material or information through the Services that actively breaks and infringes any trademark, copyright, patent, trade secret, or any other rights of any party (including, without limitation, rights of privacy or publicity).
ts_sub_text_3_3: Don't create or use any third-party software, including, without limitation, “mods,” cheats, addons, or hacks, designed to change or manipulate tournaments.
ts_sub_text_3_4: Don't make any false, misleading, or inaccurate statements.
ts_sub_text_3_5: Don’t use language that is threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, libelous, deceptive, fraudulent, tortious, obscene, offensive, profane, unlawful, or invasive of another’s privacy.
ts_sub_text_3_6: Don't impersonate any person or entity, including any employee or representative of GBarena.
ts_sub_text_3_7: Don't restrict or inhibit any other visitor or member from using the Services, including, without limitation, using “hacking” or defacing any portion of the Services.
ts_sub_text_3_8: Don't try to access parts of the Services for which you are not authorized by GBarena, circumvent or attempt to circumvent any security or password protection on or in the Services, access the Services by any means other than through the interface that is provided and authorized by GBarena.
ts_sub_text_3_10: Don't remove any copyright, trademark, or other proprietary rights notices contained on or in the Services.
ts_sub_text_3_11: Don't ever stalk or otherwise harass another; or Harvesting or collecting information about Services visitors, users, or Account holders.
ts_sub_text_3_12: Don't Spamming in private chat or using offensive pictures or names or using profanity.
ts_sub_text_3_desclaimer: GBarena has all right to permanently suspend or terminate your Account and your access to the Services, and/or disqualify you from receiving any prize(s) offered by the tournaments if it suspects that you have violated any of the User Rules.
User_Generation_text_1: The creation, distribution, transmission, public display, or performance, and the accessing, downloading, or copying of your Contributions do not and will not infringe the proprietary rights, including but not limited to the copyright, patent, trademark, trade secret, or moral rights of any third party.
User_Generation_text_2: You are the creator and owner or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, releases, and permissions to use and to authorize us, the Site, and other users of the Site to use your Contributions in any manner contemplated by the Site and these Terms of Use.
User_Generation_text_3: You have the written consent, release, and/or permission of each and every identifiable individual person in your Contributions to use the name or likeness of each and every such identifiable individual person to enable inclusion and use of your Contributions in any manner contemplated by the Site and these Terms of Use.
User_Generation_text_4: Your Contributions are not false, inaccurate, or misleading.
User_Generation_text_5: Your Contributions are not unsolicited or unauthorized advertising, promotional materials, pyramid schemes, chain letters, spam, mass mailings, or other forms of solicitation.
User_Generation_text_6: Your Contributions are not obscene, lewd, lascivious, filthy, violent, harassing, libelous, slanderous, or otherwise objectionable (as determined by us).
User_Generation_text_7: Your Contributions do not ridicule, mock, disparage, intimidate, or abuse anyone.
User_Generation_text_8: Your Contributions are not used to harass or threaten (in the legal sense of those terms) any other person and to promote violence against a specific person or class of people.
User_Generation_text_9: Your Contributions do not violate any applicable law, regulation, or rule.
User_Generation_text_10: Your Contributions do not violate the privacy or publicity rights of any third party.
User_Generation_text_11: Your Contributions do not contain any material that solicits personal information from anyone under the age of 18 or exploits people under the age of 18 in a sexual or violent manner.
User_Generation_text_12: Your Contribution does not violate any applicable law concerning child pornography, or otherwise intended to protect the health or well-being of minors.
User_Generation_text_13: Your Contributions do not include any offensive comments that are connected to race, national origin, gender, sexual preference, or physical handicap.
User_Generation_text_14: Your Contributions do not otherwise violate, or link to material that violates, any provision of these Terms of Use, or any applicable law or regulation.
User_Generation_text_1_1: Any use of the Site in violation of the foregoing violates these Terms of Use and may result in, among other things, termination or suspension of your rights to use the Site.
User_Generation_text_2_1: GBarena cannot ensure that your use of the Services will be continuous and uninterrupted. You agree to not account GBarena liable for any interference and any interruption of servicing of the Services.
Links_To_Other_title: Links to other websites and third party sites
Links_To_Other_Desc: The Terms and Conditions apply only to the Services provided by us. The Services may contain connections and linked to different sites not worked or functioned by GBarena. In the event that you use these links, you will leave our Services. The terms and conditions outlined in this part are not relevant to these sites and we endorse or consider those sites. GBarena provides these links to different sites as a convenience. Such links do not indicate GBarena's consent of data or material on some other site, as we do not represent the legality, functionality, suitability or quality of any of these linked sites. The use of any linked website is at the user’s own risk. We claim all liabilities concerning your access to and the use of such linked sites, and you therefore irrevocably and completely discharge and always release us from and defer any case you may have against GBarena as for such websites.
Copyrights_Trademarks_Desc: The data and materials provided on our website or through our Services, including any substance, information, text, plans, designs, content, pictures, photos, outlines, sound and video clips, logos, symbols and connections are claimed only by GBarena or its licensors. The Services, including all Services programming, data sets, restrictive data, documentation, programming, substance, PC codes, ideas, expertise and materials (and all changes and subsidiary modifications therefor and any intellectual property and different rights related) including, without restrictions, the assortment, collection, sequence and process of certain items, is owned and operated by GBarena and will remain the exclusive property of GBarena. You recognize that the Services are ensured by copyright, trademark (brand name) and different laws. You further recognize that you do not have any ownership rights by using the Services or the Materials provided by us. You will not test, challenge or in any case harm GBarena’s ownership of Services and its materials within. The trademarks, logos, and operation marks shown on or in the Services are the registered and unlisted trademarks of GBarena’s and its advisors, licensors, and others. The Trademarks claimed by GBarena, regardless of whether enlisted or unregistered, may not be utilized regarding any item or materials that is not offered by Gbarena, in any way that is probably going to create uncertainty with clients, or in any way that discredits GBarena. Nothing contained on or in our Services ought to be understood as allowing, by suggestion, foreclosure or otherwise, any permit or right to use any Trademark without the expression if written permission of GBarena, its licensors or third parties of any Trademarks. Misapplying and misusing any of our Trademarks is restricted.
Users_Desc: We help the organizers to create and manage tournaments and events in online video games through our platform. Each tournament on the platform is different in prizes, tournament system, and rules ... Etc, when you joined to any tournament, you will be subject to all its laws and regulations, as long as it does not conflict with the laws of the platform and you approve to receive communications from the organizer and GBarena is not responsible for monitoring organizers’ communications or administering or promised prizes or rewards. And you participate in the Services at your own risk and agree.
Organizers_Desc: Announcing a fake tournament, or failure to deliver prizes to the winners In a maximum period of 45 days, or deceit for not delivering prizes to the winners with anyways or manipulation of match results will expose you to a complete ban on your Battle arena in addition to your accounts and your community or company in the blacklist.
Organizers_Advertising_Desc: We own official pages on social media platforms (counting, without impediment, Facebook, Instagram and Twitter) related to the Services. You acknowledge that the Social Media Pages may mention features of certain personal identifiable information. You further recognize and acknowledge that we have no obligation or responsibilities
Guaranteed_Prizes_Desc: We have many tournaments with prizes guaranteed from GBarena, so we are responsible to send them to the winners within 14 days from the date of sending the winner information and if the winner didn't send his information within 30 days after finishing the tournament, the prizes will be canceled, and the winner doesn't have the right to claim them, the winner is not entitled to claim it after finished 30 days.

TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, IN CONNECTION WITH THE SITE AND YOUR USE THEREOF, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. GBARENA MAKES NO WARRANTIES NOR REPRESENT THE ACCURACY, RELIABILITY OR COMPLETENESS OF CONTENT OF OUR SITE OR ANY OTHER CONTENT OF LINKED WEBSITES TO GBARENA. AS WITH THE PURCHASE OF A PRODUCT OR SERVICE THROUGH ANY MEDIUM OR IN ANY ENVIRONMENT, YOU SHOULD USE YOUR BEST JUDGMENT AND EXERCISE CAUTION WHERE APPROPRIATE.
Corrections_Desc: There may be information on the Site that contains typographical errors, inaccuracies, or exclusion, including descriptions, pricing, availability, and various other information. GBarena has the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies, or omissions and to change or update the information on the Site at any time, without prior notice.

If you believe that certain individuals are violating these terms of services, kindly contact us through our email mail@gbarena.com or contact our support team.

premium.exclusiveEventsDesc: Access to exclusive events for PRIME members only
premium.gbCoinsDesc: Unlock the ability to purchase GB Coins
premium.gifDesc: Unlock the ability to change your profile picture to a GIF
premium.customUserTagDesc: Customize your username & tag once a month
premium.primeAccessDesc: Unlimited access to tournaments, challenges, and special events.
premium.reachedLimit: Oops!😬 You've reached the limit for joining tournaments and challenges this month.
premium.upgradePrimeContent: No worries—upgrade to Prime for unlimited access and enjoy premium features! 🌟
premium.premiumAnswerOne: Prime is a premium subscription offering our users a variety of perks that were previously limited or locked, including unlimited access to tournaments and special events, profile customization, and more.
premium.premiumAnswerTwo: Prime cost varies depending on where you reside. You can check Prime costs and plans under Prime>Plans & Subscription
premium.premiumAnswerThree: You can purchase Prime by visiting the Prime tab on our website.
premium.premiumQuestionFour: Will there be more perks added to Prime later on?
premium.premiumAnswerFour: Prime is starting big and getting bigger by time, as we are continuously working on improving the Prime experience and adding perks for our users.
premium.editReferenceNumber: Only GB prime user can edit reference number

gb_coins_redeemed: GBcoins can be redeemed inside GBarena's store
win_free_coin: Now you can win free GBCoins by referring your friends to the challenges, here's how:
referral_desc1: copy your invitation link and send it to your friends.
referral_desc2: when your friend  plays a challenge you win GBCoins equal to 10% (extra) of what your friends win.
ask_admin_qrcode: Ask your admin to scan your QR Code.
No Connected third parties yet!: You haven't connected with any third parties yet.

faq.answer1: Challenges are a fun way to compete with other players to level up your gaming experience. By participating in challenges you get rewarded with GBcoins based on your achievements on the leaderboard.
faq.answer2: Quests are a new way to gain some extra GBcoins! Track your progress bar and do the required quests by joining challenges to claim the prize.
faq.answer3: You can win more GBcoins by inviting your friends to challenges. When your friend joins the challenge and plays, you will win 10% extra coins of your friend's winnings in GBcoins.
faq.answer4: GBcoins are the main currency of GBarena. They can be used to buy products from the GBarena Store like RP and VP points for League of Legends and Valorant
faq.question5: How to claim my Quest rewards?
faq.answer5: You can claim your Quest rewards once you complete the progress of that Quest. There is a progress bar that indicates how far you've gone.
faq.question6: How to send a referral code to a friend?
faq.answer6: After joining a challenge, you can find the  Refer a Friend  button, you can either copy the code or send them the Referral Link.

referlist.three: Copy (Referral Code) or (Referral Link) and send it to your friend to use when joining the challenge.
referlist.four: Ask your friend to play one game and claim score.
referlist.five: Remember, You must refer different and they must participate and claim their score to be counted as a completed quest.

matchList.noBracketsMessage: Tournament brackets are not created yet!

teamSettings.sendInvitationMessage: You have the option to invite individuals from your friends list, or alternatively, share an invitation link directly with the members.
teamSettings.noRequests: You don’t have any join request yet!

tournament.noAcceptedParticipantsMessage: There are no accepted participants yet

summary.joinRequestMessage: You have submitted {{requestMessage}} requests to join this tournament kindly ask the team leader to accept your join request.
summary.joinedAsTeamMember: you have joined this tournament as team member with team
summary.noPrizeMessage: tournament organizer did not add prizes to this tournament
summary.descriptionMessage: tournament organizer did not add description to this tournament

Prize_Guaranteed: This tournament prize is going to be handed by GBarena, make sure to read the
permissions_text: Add Admins and moderators to help you manage the tournament
aggregated_matches_text: A series number of matches played by the same group of participants where all matches points are aggregated in a final match result
tournament_hidden_text: Tournament will be delisted from the platform and only those who has the link will be able to reach the tournament
contact_details_text: Players can reach you out through these contact information
title: Title
confirmation_list_text: In order to be considered for the tournament, participants must first seek approval from one of the admins, who will review their request to join.
Pending_message_text: Alter the message that appears to players who have asked to participate in the tournament and are awaiting a response.
show_pending_participants_text: The purpose of this choice is to permit players to view the list of individuals who have requested to join but are awaiting approval.
accept_rules_text: Before joining the tournament, users are required to give their consent to the tournament rules by selecting this option.
required_info_text: Choose the specific required information that players must provide before joining the tournament.
first_stage_text: Choose the type of bracket, rules, and regulations you would like to use for the tournament's first stage, Make sure to review all the settings carefully and double-check everything before finalizing the first stage settings.
second_stage_text: Choose the type of bracket, rules, and regulations you would like to use for the tournament's second stage.
single_elimination_text: Tournament format in which each participant competes against a single opponent. The winner of each match advances to the next round, while the loser is eliminated from the tournament.
double_elimination_text: Tournament format in which each participant has the opportunity to lose once before being eliminated from the tournament, using two brackets the winner's  and the loser's bracket.
round_robin_text: Tournament format in which each participant competes directly against every other participant in the same group, where the final ranking is based on a specific pointing system.
free_for_all_text: FFA format is a competition structure in which players or teams compete against each other in a series of matches with the goal of climbing a  ladder  depending on a pointing system.
no_of_participants_in_group_error: No. of participants per group is mandatory
no_of_qualified_participants: No. of qualified participants per group
no_of_qualified_participants_error: No. of qualified participants per group is mandatory
checkin_text: Once check in is open, only players who check's in prior the tournament start date will be considered inside the bracket
seed_bracket_text: Organizers can seed participants into a bracket manually or automatically, and publish it for participants to view their matches and opponents.
finish_text: Once the tournament is completed, the admin can finish the tournament and add the winners.
checkin_settings_text: The check-in process requires players to confirm their participation and verify their eligibility within a specific period. Failure to complete the check-in process will result in disqualification from the tournament.
publish_tournament_text: This step in the tournament setup process signifies that the tournament is ready to go and that players can start the registration process. However, it is important to ensure that all the necessary settings for the tournament and bracket are ready.
add_tournament_event_desc: Here you can attach this tournament to a certain event
acc_desc: you can only join the league of legends challenges     if your account is connected with your league of legends account
no_acc: you don't have account connected with league of legends to show
add_new_acc: add new account to join challenge with
no_challenges: There are no active challenges at the current moment
no_upcoming_challenges: There are no upcoming challenges yet
no_finished_challenges: There are no finished challenges yet
join_challenge_desc: Join any challenge you want and play as many times as you like, try to achieve the highest score possible in match made games(Not Custom).
after_playing_challenge_desc: After playing a challenge  click on claim score so the system fetches your score automatically and will update your score and prize in the challenge leaderboard.
after_challenge_over_desc: After the challenge time is over, the prizes will be sent to all players who got score of at least  1 , the higher your rank, the higher your prize will be.
claim_challenge_start: Claiming will be possible when Challenge starts.
claim_tooltip: Don't forget to click  Claim Score  after playing a match
question_one: 1- What are the included games, and for which platform will the tournaments be?
answer_one: All Etisalat tournaments are going to be for PC and mobile, and the games to be included are: (PUBG Mobile, Valorant, and Free fire).
question_two: 2- How many Etisalat tournaments are there?
answer_two: Aside from the already announced ones, many others are going to be announced throughout the whole year, so you better be ready!
question_three: 3-Do I have to pay fees in order to participate in Etisalat tournaments?
question_four: 4- How can I receive my prize??
answer_four: If the tournament prizes are in-game currency, we will send you a code in a private message on GBarena to be redeemed from the game itself, or we will add it to your account directly.  If the prizes are stated as an amount of money, it will be sent directly to you through one of three different payment methods (PayPal) depending on your preferences.
question_five: 5- How long do the prizes take to be delivered?
answer_five: The tournament prizes will be delivered to you within 30 working days starting right after you send us your payment information, or within 4 working days if you have a GBarena premium account.
question_six: 6- How can I contact tournament support?
answer_six: You can contact the support team through the GBarena Discord server, or through the live chat on the side menu of the website.
question_seven: 7- Are the Etisalat tournaments available in my country?
answer_seven: The tournaments are available ONLY for countries placed in the Middle East.
question_eight: 8- How do I report cheaters, players that are breaking the rules, or players using third party programs?
answer_eight: You can report them directly to our tournament support team through the Discord server.
question_nine: 9- Why is my request to join the tournament not accepted yet?
answer_nine: Your request will be accepted by the tournament organizer as soon as possible if you have filled in all the required information.
question_ten: 10- How can I find the custom room codes and links for the tournament (Fortnite, PUBG, etc)?
answer_ten: Within the first 10 minutes after the tournament starts, you should receive your room code/link (depending on the game), and you can follow the status of the tournament and recent updates with the organizers on Discord.
Add_Any_Note: Add any note you want in here...
Player_Add_Value: Player didn't add any value yet
Search_For_Friends: Search for you friends name here
Title: Title
playgrounds_valorant_desc: In the world of Valorant, Season 3 promises triple the action. We've set up three tournaments tailored to a specific skill level. Whether you're honing your skills or already a tactical genius, there's a tournament just right for you. Conquer your opponents, win cash prizes, and earn fantastic in-game rewards.
playgrounds_league_desc: For League of Legends fans, Season 3 is a triple treat. We're hosting three tournaments, catering to every skill level. Whether you are refining your mastery or a seasoned pro, you'll find your place here. Compete for exciting rewards and experience epic battles on the Rift.
playgrounds_wildrift_desc: Calling all Wild Rift enthusiasts! Season 3 is your chance to shine. Play thrilling games with others like you, no matter your skill level. Win cool rewards and have a blast in-game. Get your team ready and join the action!
playgrounds_question_one: What is the minimum age to register in Playground?
playgrounds_question_two: What is the minimum roster size for a team to register in Playground?
playgrounds_question_three: How many subs can a team have?
playgrounds_question_four: What are the critical dates of season 3?
playgrounds_question_five: Can you explain the rank restrictions for each tournament?
playgrounds_question_six: What are the prizes that players can win in each tournament?
playgrounds_question_eight: What circuit points are granted at the end of this tournament?
playgrounds_question_nine: Can AL/VCL players register for this tournament?
playgrounds_question_ten: What are the eligibility rules regarding this tournament?
playgrounds_question_eleven: What are the eligibility rules regarding this tournament?
playgrounds_answer_four: Registration: 22 October - 5 November   Tournament start date: 7 November   Tournament maximum end date: 10 December
playgrounds_answer_five: Rising stars: Maximum rank for the whole roster = Silver Contenders: Maximum rank for the whole roster = Emerald for LOL / Diamond for VAL Elite: No rank restrictions
playgrounds_answer_six: Elite: $4500 for the top 3 teams + Circuit points for the top 16 teams Contenders: $500 for first place + GB coins (Guaranteed for rank 2, 3, and 4, a giveaway for the other teams) Rising stars: GB coins (Guaranteed for the top 4, a giveaway for the other teams)
playgrounds_answer_seven: When you participate in the tournament and play at least one game, you’ll enter a giveaway to win a lot of GB coins you can use to redeem cool stuff. For each game you win in the tournament, you double your chances to win in the giveaway! The giveaway is only for Contenders and Rising Stars brackets.
playgrounds_answer_eight: Circuit points are gathered while scoring the top 16 in any tournament with the Road to AL/VCL stamp. Playground is a Tier 1 tournament, meaning it grants the most significant number of circuit points among any other tournament. Teams that have gathered the maximum number of circuit points at the end of the year will play relegations against the bottom AL/VCL teams for the 2024 season.
playgrounds_answer_nine: AL Div 1 players and VCL players can’t play in this tournament.
playgrounds_answer_ten: You can have up to 2 imports from the EMEA competitive region. The rest of the roster has to be LTR.
playgrounds_answer_eleven: LTR means that you either are: Resident in a MENA country Lived your first 13 years in a MENA country Lived 3 years out of the last 5 years in a MENA country Played 2 splits out of the 3 previous splits in MENA AL/VCL

gamerSettings.setupUsingApp: Setup using an app authenticator app (Google Auth, Authy, ...)

passwordValidator.passwordLengthValidation: Password must be at least {{length}} characters
passwordValidator.passwordLengthRangeValidation: Password must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
